data.title: New Song – Jazz at the Blue Lamp
data.meta_description: A young composer with a unique voice - Chun-Wei Kang can often be heard spurring many of jazz's emerging figures from behind the drums. New Song is a manifestation of Chun's ongoing pursuit for sensitivity, understanding and praise. You can expect music which explores diverse expressions and landscapes from a…
data.text:
A young composer with a unique voice – Chun-Wei Kang can often be heard spurring many of jazz’s emerging figures from behind the drums. New Song is a manifestation of Chun’s ongoing pursuit for sensitivity, understanding and praise. You can expect music which explores diverse expressions and landscapes from a quartet of strong characters.

Line up:

Jon Green – Trumpet/FX

Tom Gibbs – Piano

Ewan Hastie – Bass

Chun-Wei Kang – Drums/Composition

“His time steady as a heartbeat in stasis. Reminded me of Oscar, Getz, Brown, and Ellis – all drumless but swinging away effortlessly.”
